item.title: 10 Movie Franchises That Abandoned Their Original Premise
item.description: Some movie franchises have to reinvent themselves to ensure they have a sustainable future, and this can mean completely abandoning their premises.

item.title: Kraven the Hunter Ending Explained
item.description: Screen Rant unravels Kraven the Hunter's ending sequel set up, the debut of a historic Spider-Man villain, and how it could all connect to the Marvel

item.title: Dennis Quaid's WW2 Movie With 92% RT Audience Score Flies Through Netflix's Top 10 US Chart 5 Years Later
item.description: Dennis Quaid's World War II movie with a 92% Rotten Tomatoes audience score flies through Netflix's Top 10 US chart five years after its release.
